Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Small dish, wheel-made from a buff-coloured clay with traces of organic temper. The base is flat and irregular, 4 cm high and string cut. Slight traces of a white slip remain.  The lip is not pronounced. Good quality work. See L 169, 170, 171 and 173.
